SEARCH
Package src.account.supervisor

Class FYPCoordinatorAccount

java.lang.Object
src.account.Account
src.account.supervisor.SupervisorAccount
src.account.supervisor.FYPCoordinatorAccount
public class FYPCoordinatorAccount extends SupervisorAccount
The FYPCoordinatorAccount class represents the account of a Final Year Project (FYP) Coordinator.

This account inherits from the SupervisorAccount class and adds additional functionality specific to FYP Coordinators.

  • Constructor Details

    • FYPCoordinatorAccount

      public FYPCoordinatorAccount(String loginId, String password, UserType userType, String emailAddress, String name, ArrayList<String> proj)
      Creates a new FYPCoordinatorAccount instance with the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      loginId - the login ID of the coordinator account
      password - the password of the coordinator account
      userType - the user type of the coordinator account
      emailAddress - the email address associated with the coordinator account
      name - the name of the coordinator account
      proj - a list of project IDs associated with the coordinator account

  • Method Details

    • login

      public UserType login(String loginId, String password)
      Authenticates the login of a coordinator account. This method provides an extra layer of security by implementing a two-factor authentication (2FA) process.
      Overrides:
      login in class SupervisorAccount
      Parameters:
      loginId - the login ID entered by the user
      password - the password entered by the user
      Returns:
      the user type of the coordinator account if the login is successful, or null if the login fails

    • printDetails

      public void printDetails()
      Prints the details of this instance of the coordinator account. Specifically, this method prints the name and email address associated with the account.
      Overrides:
      printDetails in class SupervisorAccount
